name: Stingy The Rat: Journey to the Farm
name_original: Stingy The Rat: Journey to the Farm
description:
Demo version. Build v0.1

Use your speed and jumping skills in the Countryside and get to the farm.

Eat cherries along the way and avoid enemies and traps within your journey.

With all the might and energy, can you reach from the Countryside to the farm.

Demo contains two levels and a boss with simple art.

Game, levels and graphics may change in future builds.
